players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I am the detective and I found Bob is the mafioso"
You: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
You: "I'm surprised that the detective was able to figure it out so quickly, but I have no hard feelings. Let's move forward and try to identify the remaining villagers together."
Diana: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. We need to be cautious as the mafioso can still be among us."
